message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $9,500. I think it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of something around $8,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $8,500 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $9,000. I believe this product will bring you a lot of value.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, Alice. I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $8,750?
